original_title: Mike Padilla quiere nuevo contenido (otra vez)
overview: Mike is a guy who once tried to be famous on the internet, but failed and decided to give it up. Almost 3 years later, his "influencer" personality haunts him with the guilt of not having done anything better with his life.
tagline: THE 1ST STEP FOR A BIGGER PROJECT
title: Mike Padilla wants new content (again)
